title: Mirrors of Fallen Stones (Poetry, #5).
description: Mirrors of Fallen Stones (Poetry, #5)- is a part of Vanessa Chattman's poetry series books. This book is the 5th Vol. of the poetry series. Mirrors of Fallen Stones (Poetry, #5) briefly describes the extent of Vanessa Chattman's creative poetic story telling in the form of fiction. Very few facts are mentioned, but dates and locations are all fiction
author: Vanessa M Chattman
